snippet: The death was the first linked to Takata’s airbags involving a rental car, and it underscored the holes in safety regulations for used or rental cars.
abstract: Honda Motor confirms California driver Jewel Brangman was killed by airbag rupture in rented 2001 Civic in September 2014; incident marks eighth death linked to faulty airbags from Japanese supplier Takata.
lead_paragraph: The death was the first linked to Takata’s airbags involving a rental car, and it underscored the holes in safety regulations for used or rental cars.

headline.main: Airbag Death in Honda Rental Car Reveals a Gap
headline.print_headline: Airbag Death in Rental Car Reveals a Gap
